name: Mickey's Delayed Date
summary: It's the night of the big dance and Mickey's dozing in his chair. Agitated, Minnie calls and wakes him up. Reminded of his date, Mickey must get ready in a hurry, and Pluto tries to help. Getting there is quite the adventure for Mickey, but he lucks out and gets by with a little help from his dog. A light-hearted, fun little short.
info:
• 中文名: 米奇约会迟到
  • 上映年度: 1947-10-03
  • 片长: 7分钟
  • 导演: Charles A. Nichols
  • 编剧: Art Scott
  • 主演: Walt Disney / Ruth Clifford
